representation_information.name: ISO/IEC 15444-1:2004. Information technology -- JPEG 2000 image coding system -- Part 1: Core coding system, Amendment 1: Codestream Restrictions, Profile 4 (formal name); JPEG 2000 Profile 4 (common name)
representation_information.description: Implementation of JPEG 2000 Core Coding (Part 1) that constrains the use of variables in the specification (restricts the codestream) to serve 4K presentations within the Digital Cinema Initiative's DCP_1_0. The restrictions include image size limited to 4,096 x 2,160 pixels, no more than one tile, 12-bit bit depth per component, no more than 6 decomposition levels, CPRL compression order, progression order and tile parts to support the scalable decompression of a 2K image as well as the 4K image, and maximum compressed bytes per frame (aggregate of color components) 1,302,083 (24 fps).
